ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, if they have had other English classes before and feel ready for the course.
I would certainly recommend this course to a fellow student especially as a way to build a vocabulary with which to discuss poetry.
I would recommend this course, because it will quickly immerse you in a rich history of not only African-American poetry, but the social movements and circumstances that surround it.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Although a fan of African American poetry, I was tentative about engaging it in my study but I am committed to doing so now. Armed with a just budding knowledge, I have already been able to make connections with themes, materials and questions covered in this course to those of my other courses as well as to my larger research interests.

I think that the mode of analysis I've begun to utilize in this course can only deepen the visual analyses I conduct in my work. And, the research I conducted for my final paper will likely form the basis for a larger project.
